solution_line_template: The cost to get the cats ready is {num_cats}*{cost_per_cat}=$<<{num_cats}*{cost_per_cat}={cost_cats}>>{cost_cats}
The cost to get adult dogs ready is {num_adult_dogs}*{cost_per_adult_dog}=$<<{num_adult_dogs}*{cost_per_adult_dog}={cost_adult_dogs}>>{cost_adult_dogs}
The cost to get puppies ready is {num_puppies}*{cost_per_puppy}=$<<{num_puppies}*{cost_per_puppy}={cost_puppies}>>{cost_puppies}
